thread.title: Sandra Resendez
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Sandra Resendez

author: Sandra Resendez
title: Sandra Resendez
text: I reserved a storage unit at the 791 S Azusa Ave, Azusa, CA Public Storage location. The young man whom assisted me was Chris. He went above and beyond my expectations in order to meet my needs regarding the storage unit. In a day and age where good customer service seems to be declining. He made a great difference. I will definitely recommend Public Storage to my family, friends, and acquaintances.
